Articles.Content: I downloaded the KSP demo,and im new to the forums,hello. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hi wrestlingforme, welcome to the KSP community.

I hope you have a lot of fun launching rockets ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome to the forum ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

If you have any questions please see the How To section.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome aboard good sir!

Consider paying for the full version. Its cheap and awesome.

DFTBA
